nodes.text: The Dynath Miners formed a mining company active in the Bright Jewel system during the Galactic Civil War. They were based at the H-5 70 Mining Facility and were allied to the Car'das. The Dynath Miners used to mine the Masul'ivis Asteroid Belt.

During the Battle of Tansarii Point Station, Black Sun pirates targeted Dynathian transports in the Masul'ivis Asteroid Belt. Car'das starfighters dispatched by Laetin A'shera finally repelled Black Sun forces and escorted Dynathian ships safely back to the H-5 70 Mining Facility. Car'das pilots also rescued First Officer Atris and the Draosa Star.
